name: Music_2422.wav
keywords: ['game music', 'computer generated sounds', 'tapping sound', 'industrial sound', 'sound of person running in boots', 'midi sounds']
caption: This game music starts off with midi sounds playing a high pitched melody. This is followed by another instrument playing a louder melody in a descending pattern of five notes followed by an ascending pattern of three notes. Then an industrial machinery sound is heard followed by the sound of a person in boots running. This song is used in a game.
